PreceptDef.label: beautiful
PreceptDef.description:
The machinations of old are breath-taking, and their weathering should be viewed as art. It's wonderful to live surrounded by things discarded by others.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Ancient junk buildings can be uninstalled and placed again as needed.
 - Colonists get mood penalties / bonuses depending on amount of ancient junk buildings in a 20 tiles radius around them. Effect checks approximately once every 5 hours.

PreceptDef.label: preferred
PreceptDef.description:
Ancient junk reminds us of the tribulations of our forefathers, subject to the eternal struggle of humanity among the stars. We can learn a great deal from studying this discarded tech.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Ancient junk buildings can be uninstalled and placed again as needed.
 - Colonists get moderate mood penalties / bonuses depending on amount of ancient junk buildings in a 20 tiles radius around them. Effect checks approximately once every 5 hours.
